gasEstimateDesc.message:
Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the Ethereum network. Koii does not profit from gas fees.

Gas fees are set by the network and fluctuate based on network traffic and transaction complexity.

This estimate will update about every 30 seconds.
